name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Sunken Dreams of Yore: Wine-Stained Tricorne
storytext: "The wine-sodden sea hat was thrust by a storm into the sky, and then carried away on the roiling waves, while those fated to lose their homelands engaged in battles bereft of hope and want."
